duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all aspects of Patient Access, including preregistration, insurance verification, point-of-service collections, financial counseling, and registration.
Identify and address denial trends, and collaborate with cross-functional departments for effective resolution.
Foster alliances with regional facilities to ensure seamless communication and cohesion.
Engage with patients, healthcare teams, and medical practitioners to uphold the highest standards of professionalism.
Provide essential support and coordination as a link to the Central Business Office (CBO).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Accounting, or a related field – Mandatory. Preferred possession of a Master’s degree.
